description: This Java source file is the main controller class for product CRUD operations in a RESTful API. It defines endpoints for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting products, utilizing Spring Boot annotations, Swagger/OpenAPI annotations for documentation, and dependency injection for the ProductService. The class handles HTTP requests and responses related to product management.

classes.name: ProductController
classes.description: Rest controller handling CRUD operations for products, exposing RESTful endpoints under /api/products.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles HTTP POST to create a new product. Validates input and returns the created product with HTTP 201 status.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET to retrieve all products, returning a list of Product objects.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET for retrieving a product by its ID. Responds with the product or 404 if not found.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles HTTP PUT to update an existing product identified by ID. Validates input and returns the updated product.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles HTTP DELETE to remove a product by ID. Responds with HTTP 204 if successful.
